title: Your children's teeth
creator_credit: Jane Massy, Margaret Thomson, Realist Films and C O I
brief_description: The structure of the teeth, tooth formation and the process of decay are explained by means of diagrams. The importance of pre-natal care and of proper diet, cleaning habits and regular inspections are also shown
creator_credit_for_label: Jane Massy, Margaret Thomson, Realist Films and C O I
